pages.md:
# AUDIO SETTING (Movie Recording) ## XLR MIC ADAPTER SETTING Adjust microphone input channel settings and the like for use with XLR microphone adapters. | Option | Description | |-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **MIC INPUT CHANNEL** | Record four-channel (quadraphonic) sound with the help of the cameraâ€™s built-in microphone, or two-channel (stereo) sound using only a microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
â€¢ **4ch XLR+CAMERA**: Record four-channel sound with the help of the cameraâ€™s built-in microphone.
â€¢ **2ch XLR ONLY**: Record two-channel sound using only an external microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter. | | **4ch AUDIO MONITORING** | Choose the source of sound output to headphones or other audio monitors during movie recording.
â€¢ **XLR**: Monitor sound from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
â€¢ **CAMERA**: Monitor sound from cameraâ€™s built-in microphone. | | **HDMI 4ch AUDIO OUTPUT** | Choose source of audio output to the HDMI connector.
â€¢ **XLR**: Audio from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter is output to the HDMI connector.
â€¢ **CAMERA**: Audio from cameraâ€™s built-in microphone is output to the HDMI connector. | > ðŸ’¡ **Note:** > - If an external microphone is connected to the cameraâ€™s microphone jack, audio will be recorded not via the cameraâ€™s built-in microphone but via the external microphone instead. > - Four-channel recording is available only when MOV is selected for movie file format.

items.value: Adjust microphone input channel settings and the like for use with XLR microphone adapters.
items.md: Adjust microphone input channel settings and the like for use with XLR microphone adapters.

rows:
Record four-channel (quadraphonic) sound with the help of the cameraâ€™s built-in microphone, or two-channel (stereo) sound using only a microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
â€¢ **4ch XLR+CAMERA**: Record four-channel sound with the help of the cameraâ€™s built-in microphone.
â€¢ **2ch XLR ONLY**: Record two-channel sound using only an external microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter.

Choose the source of sound output to headphones or other audio monitors during movie recording.
â€¢ **XLR**: Monitor sound from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
â€¢ **CAMERA**: Monitor sound from cameraâ€™s built-in microphone.

Choose source of audio output to the HDMI connector.
â€¢ **XLR**: Audio from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter is output to the HDMI connector.
â€¢ **CAMERA**: Audio from cameraâ€™s built-in microphone is output to the HDMI connector.
